content.html: By @jenzerb "I Left My Career in X Because of the Shitty Men in Charge and They Are Still In Charge and Still Fucking Up" "I left because I blew the whistle on my boss for doing something unethical..." Can be the headline of many of our stories. jenzerb.medium.com/i-left-my-care…
content.value:
By @jenzerb 

"I Left My Career in X Because of the Shitty Men in Charge and They Are Still In Charge and Still Fucking Up"

"I left because I blew the whistle on my boss for doing something unethical..." 

Can be the headline of many of our stories. 

jenzerb.medium.com/i-left-my-care…

content.html: Well, this hits uncomfortably close to home. Women rarely get the chance to "fail up" but men get that opportunity all the damn time.
content.value:
